verses.text: And \w take|strong="H7126"\w* thou unto thee \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* with him, from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, that he may minister unto me in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*, \add even\add* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w Nadab|strong="H5070"\w* and \w Abihu|strong="H0030"\w*, \w Eleazar|strong="H0499"\w* and \w Ithamar|strong="H0385"\w*, \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* for \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* for \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* and for \w beauty|strong="H8597"\w*.

And thou shalt \w speak|strong="H1696"\w* unto all \add that are\add* \w wise|strong="H2450"\w* \w hearted|strong="H3820"\w*, whom I have \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with the \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* of \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, that they may \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* to \w consecrate|strong="H6942"\w* him, that he may minister unto me in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*.

And these \add are\add* the \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* which they shall \w make|strong="H6213"\w*; a \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w*, and an \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, and a \w robe|strong="H4598"\w*, and a \w broidered|strong="H8665"\w* \w coat|strong="H3801"\w*, a \w mitre|strong="H4701"\w*, and a \w girdle|strong="H0073"\w*: and they shall \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w* for \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, that he may minister unto me in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*.

And they shall \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*.

¶ And they shall \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \add of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \add of\add* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \add of\add* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, \add of\add* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, with \w cunning|strong="H2803"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*.

It shall have the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w shoulderpieces|strong="H3802"\w* thereof \w joined|strong="H2266"\w* at the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w edges|strong="H7098"\w* thereof; and \add so\add* it shall be joined \w together|strong="H2266"\w*.

And the curious \w girdle|strong="H2805"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0642"\w*, which \add is\add* upon it, shall be of the same, according to the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* thereof; \add even of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \add of\add* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*.\f + \fr 28.8 \ft curious: or, embroidered\f*

And thou shalt \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w onyx|strong="H7718"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, and \w grave|strong="H6605"\w* on them the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

\w Six|strong="H8337"\w* of their \w names|strong="H8034"\w* on \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, and \add the other\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w rest|strong="H3498"\w* on the \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, according to their \w birth|strong="H8435"\w*.

With the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of an \w engraver|strong="H2796"\w* in \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*, \add like\add* the \w engravings|strong="H6603"\w* of a \w signet|strong="H2368"\w*, shalt thou \w engrave|strong="H6605"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* with the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them to be \w set|strong="H4142"\w* in \w ouches|strong="H4865"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* upon the \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \add for\add* \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* of \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* unto the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* their \w names|strong="H8034"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* upon his \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w* for a \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w*.
¶ And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w ouches|strong="H4865"\w* \add of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*;

And \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w chains|strong="H8333"\w* \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* at the \w ends|strong="H4020"\w*; \add of\add* \w wreathen|strong="H5688"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them, and \w fasten|strong="H5414"\w* the \w wreathen|strong="H5688"\w* \w chains|strong="H8333"\w* to the \w ouches|strong="H4865"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* with \w cunning|strong="H2803"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w*; after the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* it; \add of\add* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, \add of\add* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \add of\add* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \add of\add* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, and \add of\add* fine \w twined|strong="H7806"\w* \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* it.

\w Foursquare|strong="H7251"\w* it shall be \add being\add* \w doubled|strong="H3717"\w*; a \w span|strong="H2239"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* thereof, and a \w span|strong="H2239"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w breadth|strong="H7341"\w* thereof.

And thou shalt \w set|strong="H4390"\w* in it \w settings|strong="H4396"\w* of \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*, \add even\add* \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w rows|strong="H2905"\w* of \w stones|strong="H0068"\w*: \add the first\add* \w row|strong="H2905"\w* \add shall be\add* a \w sardius|strong="H0124"\w*, a \w topaz|strong="H6357"\w*, and a \w carbuncle|strong="H1304"\w*: \add this shall be\add* the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \w row|strong="H2905"\w*.\f + \fr 28.17 \ft set…: Heb. fill in it fillings of stone\f*\f + \fr 28.17 \ft sardius: or, ruby\f*
And the \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w row|strong="H2905"\w* \add shall be\add* an \w emerald|strong="H5306"\w*, a \w sapphire|strong="H5601"\w*, and a \w diamond|strong="H3095"\w*.
And the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \w row|strong="H2905"\w* a \w ligure|strong="H3958"\w*, an \w agate|strong="H7618"\w*, and an \w amethyst|strong="H0306"\w*.

And the \w fourth|strong="H7243"\w* \w row|strong="H2905"\w* a \w beryl|strong="H8658"\w*, and an \w onyx|strong="H7718"\w*, and a \w jasper|strong="H3471"\w*: they shall be \w set|strong="H7660"\w* in \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* in their \w inclosings|strong="H4396"\w*.\f + \fr 28.20 \ft inclosings: Heb. fillings\f*

And the \w stones|strong="H0068"\w* shall be with the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w*, according to their \w names|strong="H8034"\w*, \add like\add* the \w engravings|strong="H6603"\w* of a \w signet|strong="H2368"\w*; every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* with his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* shall they be according to the \w twelve|strong="H8147"\w* \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* upon the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* \w chains|strong="H8331"\w* at the \w ends|strong="H1383"\w* \add of\add* \w wreathen|strong="H5688"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*.

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* upon the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* on the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w*.

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wreathen|strong="H5688"\w* \add chains\add* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* in the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* \add which are\add* on the \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w*.

And \add the other\add* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w wreathen|strong="H5688"\w* \add chains\add* thou shalt \w fasten|strong="H5414"\w* in the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ouches|strong="H4865"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add them\add* on the \w shoulderpieces|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H4136"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and thou shalt \w put|strong="H7760"\w* them upon the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w ends|strong="H7098"\w* of the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* in the \w border|strong="H8193"\w* thereof, which \add is\add* in the \w side|strong="H5676"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \w inward|strong="H1004"\w*.

And \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \add other\add* \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w*, and shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* them on the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w sides|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \w underneath|strong="H4295"\w*, \w toward|strong="H4136"\w* the \w forepart|strong="H6440"\w* thereof, over \w against|strong="H5980"\w* the \add other\add* \w coupling|strong="H4225"\w* thereof, \w above|strong="H4605"\w* the curious \w girdle|strong="H2805"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*.

And they shall \w bind|strong="H7405"\w* the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* by the \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* thereof unto the \w rings|strong="H2885"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* with a \w lace|strong="H6616"\w* of \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, that \add it\add* may be above the curious \w girdle|strong="H2805"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*, and that the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* be not \w loosed|strong="H2118"\w* from the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w*.

And \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w names|strong="H8034"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* in the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* upon his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, when he \w goeth|strong="H0935"\w* in unto the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add*, for a \w memorial|strong="H2146"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.

¶ And thou shalt \w put|strong="H5414"\w* in the \w breastplate|strong="H2833"\w* of \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* the \w Urim|strong="H0224"\w* and the \w Thummim|strong="H8550"\w*; and they shall be upon \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, when he \w goeth|strong="H0935"\w* in \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*: and \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* shall \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* upon his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.
¶ And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* of the \w ephod|strong="H0646"\w* \w all|strong="H3632"\w* \add of\add* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*.

And there shall be an \w hole|strong="H6310"\w* in the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of it, in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* thereof: it shall have a \w binding|strong="H8193"\w* of \w woven|strong="H0707"\w* \w work|strong="H4639"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w hole|strong="H6310"\w* of it, as it were the \w hole|strong="H6310"\w* of an \w habergeon|strong="H8473"\w*, that it be not \w rent|strong="H7167"\w*.

¶ And \add beneath\add* upon the \w hem|strong="H7757"\w* of it thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w pomegranates|strong="H7416"\w* \add of\add* \w blue|strong="H8504"\w*, and \add of\add* \w purple|strong="H0713"\w*, and \add of\add* \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w*, round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* the \w hem|strong="H7757"\w* thereof; and \w bells|strong="H6472"\w* of \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* \w between|strong="H8432"\w* them round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*:\f + \fr 28.33 \ft hem: or, skirts\f*

A \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w bell|strong="H6472"\w* and a \w pomegranate|strong="H7416"\w*, a \w golden|strong="H2091"\w* \w bell|strong="H6472"\w* and a \w pomegranate|strong="H7416"\w*, upon the \w hem|strong="H7757"\w* of the \w robe|strong="H4598"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

And it shall be upon \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w*: and his \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* shall be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* when he \w goeth|strong="H0935"\w* in unto the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place\add* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and when he \w cometh|strong="H3318"\w* out, that he \w die|strong="H4191"\w* not.

¶ And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* a \w plate|strong="H6731"\w* \add of\add* \w pure|strong="H2889"\w* \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and \w grave|strong="H6605"\w* upon it, \add like\add* the \w engravings|strong="H6603"\w* of a \w signet|strong="H2368"\w*, \w HOLINESS|strong="H6944"\w* TO THE \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H7760"\w* it on a \w blue|strong="H8504"\w* \w lace|strong="H6616"\w*, that it may be upon the \w mitre|strong="H4701"\w*; upon the \w forefront|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w mitre|strong="H4701"\w* it shall be.

And it shall be upon \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w forehead|strong="H4696"\w*, that \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* may \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* the \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* of the holy \w things|strong="H6944"\w*, which the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* shall \w hallow|strong="H6942"\w* in all their \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w gifts|strong="H4979"\w*; and it shall be \w always|strong="H8548"\w* upon his \w forehead|strong="H4696"\w*, that they may be \w accepted|strong="H7522"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

¶ And thou shalt \w embroider|strong="H7660"\w* the \w coat|strong="H3801"\w* of fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, and thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w mitre|strong="H4701"\w* \add of\add* fine \w linen|strong="H8336"\w*, and thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* the \w girdle|strong="H0073"\w* \add of\add* \w needlework|strong="H7551"\w*.

¶ And for \w Aaron’s|strong="H0175"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* \w coats|strong="H3801"\w*, and thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* for them \w girdles|strong="H0073"\w*, and \w bonnets|strong="H4021"\w* shalt thou \w make|strong="H6213"\w* for them, for \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* and for \w beauty|strong="H8597"\w*.

And thou shalt \w put|strong="H3847"\w* them upon \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* thy \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, and his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* with him; and shalt \w anoint|strong="H4886"\w* them, and \w consecrate|strong="H4390"\w* them, and \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* them, that they may minister unto me in the \w priest’s office|strong="H3547"\w*.\f + \fr 28.41 \ft consecrate…: Heb. fill their hand\f*

And thou shalt \w make|strong="H6213"\w* them \w linen|strong="H0906"\w* \w breeches|strong="H4370"\w* to \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* their \w nakedness|strong="H1320"\w*; from the \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* even unto the \w thighs|strong="H3409"\w* they shall reach:\f + \fr 28.42 \ft their…: Heb. flesh of their nakedness\f*\f + \fr 28.42 \ft reach: Heb. be\f*

And they shall be upon \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, and upon his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, when they \w come|strong="H0935"\w* in unto the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, or when they come \w near|strong="H5066"\w* unto the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* in the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place;\add* that they \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* not \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*, and \w die|strong="H4191"\w*: \add it shall be\add* a \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w* unto him and his \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him.
